item.title: shinyTravel
item.description: For the 2020 shiny apps contest, I developed an app that provides travel recommendations based on your preferences for coffee, breweries, and museums. This app demonstrates how to create a custom shiny framework and integrate non-R/non-shiny tools into the development process.
item.dc:creator: @dcruvolo

item.title: Shiny and CSS Preprocessors
item.description: Managing css can become difficult as projects grow and new features are added. Using a css preprocessor brings many helpful features for writing and managing css. In this tutorial, learn how to use SASS in your shiny applications.
item.dc:creator: @dcruvolo

item.title: Responsive Datatables
item.description: Data tables are a good method for displaying data on the web. However, this can lead to issues of content overflows on mobile devices or if the browser is resized. In this tutorial, we will learn how to create a responsive table for use in shiny.
item.dc:creator: @dcruvolo
